title: WHIRLING F2 / TAPE PLAYER
description: You can click on tape player -- it has broken down while you were gone. Can't listen to any tapes now, best you find a new one from Roy.

dialogueTree.title: Stereo 8 Player: "The compact tape player is still an..."
dialogueTree.text: The compact tape player is still and silent. Seems it has completely broken down now.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The machine was made in Revachol by..."
links.text: The machine was made in Revachol by a company called Lemercier -- their logo depicts the triple-towered Delta skyline. It was supposedly built to last.

links.title: Interfacing: "There is no fixing this one."
links.text: There is no fixing this one.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This would have been *very* helpfu..."
links.text: "This would have been *very* helpful with the 'Megamix'." He stares at the tape player. "But it isn't anymore."

links.title: Half Light: "Fuck is that going to achieve? Bein..."
links.text: Fuck is that going to achieve? Being a smart-ass... making your nostrils flare.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant doesn't even flinch...."
links.text: The lieutenant doesn't even flinch. "Anyway, let's try to find a new tape player. Perhaps we should talk to Roy at the pawnshop."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant doesn't even flinch...."
links.text: The lieutenant doesn't even flinch. "Anyway, let's try to find a new tape player. There's a pawnshop near the water lock, maybe they have a spare."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My Kineema only comes with a radio..."
links.text: "My Kineema only comes with a radio," he ponders. "Let's try to find a new tape player. Perhaps we should talk to Roy at the pawnshop -- he has stuff."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My Kineema only comes with a radio..."
links.text: "My Kineema only comes with a radio," he ponders. "We should try to find a new tape player. There's a pawnshop near the water lock, south of here. Maybe they have a spare."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course," he notes. "We should t..."
links.text: "Of course," he notes. "We should try to find a new tape player. Perhaps we can talk to Roy at the pawnshop south of here -- he had stuff."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course," he notes. "Anyway, we..."
links.text: "Of course," he notes. "Anyway, we should try to find a new tape player. There's a pawnshop near the water lock, south of here. Maybe they have a spare."

links.title: Interfacing: "Best find a new player. A boombox,..."
links.text: Best find a new player. A boombox, funky style? Maybe the guy at the pawnshop can help out?

links.title: Interfacing: "I guess the only thing to do is to..."
links.text: I guess the only thing to do is to find a new player. Might be one waiting for you out there somewhere.

links.title: You: "What should I do now, Stereo 8 Play..."
links.text: What should I do now, Stereo 8 Player?

links.title: Stereo 8 Player: "The broken tape player doesn't have..."
links.text: The broken tape player doesn't have the ability to respond. But Kim would.
